tweet: We are very excited to announce the launch of the Cardano Ambassador Program! This program helps us recognize and acknowledge the good work happening in the community. Learn more here:  https://t.co/y45zmBgpdi #CardanoCommunity
The next weekly technical report will be released by IOHK after the holidays. Thanks for your understanding. Happy Holidays!

Interested about backwards-incompatible Cardano wallet API changes that were in Cardano 1.4 or how to build a Cardano client with both the old V0 wallet API and the new V1 wallet API? Look no further! Here's the latest IOHK blog post explaining both:  https://t.co/sKS8Hl0CQV
Watch our released videos from IOHK's PlutusFest 2018 here, and more to be added:  https://t.co/HoftrnmjdI #Cardano #PlutusFest #CardanoCommunity

After a lot of consultation with the community and many different groups, the first version of the Cardano Ambassador program is finally here! This is a good step towards giving recognition to all those who contribute to the Cardano ecosystem!  https://t.co/YL1YajUNx3

This April we had the privilege to host an evening with the @Cardano team at #ayeka. The topic was FORMAL VERIFICATION and the attached video Shows #zenprotocol's lead developer, @AsherManning giving a great presentation on Resource verification.  https://t.co/uBbvIcK2G2
